name: Laser Defender - Free Space Shooter [Android]
description:
Laser Defender - Free Space Shooter is a space scrolling shooter on your phone! Do you remember the retro game Laser Defender? Then immerse yourself in the magnificent gameplay in a beautiful shell.
*
Fight through the galaxies and destroy enemies.
*
Complete levels and collect rewards.
*
Customize your character.
*
Upgrade your space ship.
*
Unlock more game modes.
